name: One For The Earth
description:
Free planet earth from the extraterrestrial pirates. In this 2D side scroller you fight as Captain Linda Meyer to save the future of planet earth.

You experience a lot of diverse and colorful levels in  pixel art style. Numerous opponents expect you! Collect crystals to arm the ship, to equip it with new weapons or to get additional bombs.
With the crystal magnet you can collect the crystals from a distance. Additional nuclear bombs and flamethrowers are very effective weapons.
